name: BreathePeace.World
description:
Enter a Virtual Reality storybook world and learn how to breathe peace. When you're ready to return home, you'll know exactly how to breathe peace in any situation, anytime, anywhere!

Key Features

In BREATHEPEACE.WORLD, you'll enter a shimmering grove of living, breathing trees, inside a luminous watercolor landscape, where uniquely sparkling snowflakes undulate in a storybook Virtual Reality world all around you.

You can Meet Aya, your adorable wisdom teacher who always greets you with boundless love and appreciation. Aya will help you awaken your innate ability to breathe peace through embodied learning.

Return again to Breathe Peace where you can stay in Aya's peaceful world as long as you like. You can breathe peace with Aya, breathe peace with the trees or simply breathe peace for yourself.

BREATHEPEACE.WORLD illuminates a simple practice which can transform your inner world into a peaceful world, your lifetime into a peaceful lifetime, and the world we share will naturally be more peaceful.


One Conscious Breath, Three Powerful Words - I AM PEACE
On the inhale, think 'I AM'; on the exhale think 'PEACE'.


Peace Is A Breath Away
Peace Is Possible
Breathe Peace In Your World
